title: Commending the students at the Henry Viscardi School in Albertson, New York, upon the occasion of launching a campaign to collect food for Island Harvest
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  commending  the  students at the Henry Viscardi
School in Albertson, New York, upon the occasion of launching a campaign
to collect food for Island Harvest

WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body to recognize that  the
quality  and  character of life in the communities across New York State
are reflective of the concerned and dedicated efforts of those organiza-
tions and individuals that are devoted to the welfare of  the  community
and its citizenry; and
  WHEREAS, This Legislative Body is justly proud to commend the students
at  the  Henry Viscardi School in Albertson, New York, upon the occasion
of launching a campaign to collect food for Island Harvest; and
  WHEREAS, The school, also known as "The Henry Viscardi School at Abil-
ities!," provides educational services and daily on-site medical care to
200  students  (K-12)  with  severe  physical  disabilities   and   rare
illnesses; it serves students from Long Island, the five boroughs of New
York City, and Westchester; and
  WHEREAS,  The  students at the Henry Viscardi School, most of whom are
in power wheelchairs, commute long distance to Viscardi because  of  the
comprehensive services it offers; and
  WHEREAS,  The students at Henry Viscardi School, comprise a unique yet
committed group of Island Harvest volunteers; they recently  launched  a
campaign to collect 1,000 pounds of food for Island Harvest; and
  WHEREAS,  The  students  and faculty at the Henry Viscardi School feel
very strongly about feeding hungry families on Long  Island;  they  have
the  determination  to see this huge undertaking through to a successful
conclusion; and
  WHEREAS, This auspicious occasion presents a  unique  opportunity  for
this  Legislative  Body  to recognize and pay tribute to the students at
the Henry Viscardi School in Albertson, New York; and
  WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body that when  organiza-
tions  and individuals of such noble aims and accomplishments, and which
serve to bring people together  for  such  constructive  and  beneficial
purposes, are brought to our attention, they should be recognized by all
the citizens of this great Empire State; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
commend the students at the Henry  Viscardi  School  in  Albertson,  New
York,  upon  the  occasion  of  launching a campaign to collect food for
Island Harvest; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to the Henry Viscardi School, 201 I U Willets  Road,  Albertson,
NY 11507-1516.
